description:
Naturally control pests on your plants

Monterey® Garden Neem Oil provides natural, multipurpose pest control for houseplants and outdoor gardens.

Harness the power of neem oil to control insects, mites, and fungal diseases on your plants. This ready-to-use spray kills eggs, larvae, and adult insects while preventing fungal attacks on plant tissues. It’s suitable for indoor and outdoor use, breaks down quickly, and leaves no lasting residue.

Sunday partners with trusted, effective solutions that support your garden’s health and productivity.

sections.product_features:
Derived from natural neem oil
Kills eggs, larvae, and adult insects
Prevents fungal diseases on plants
Ideal for roses, flowers, houseplants, and vegetables
Safe for use on edible plants
For indoor and outdoor use
sections.ingredients: Clarified Hydrophobic Extract of Neem Oil – 70%: Oil made from the seeds of neem trees (Azadirachta indica) to control and prevent insects, mites, and diseases.
sections.instructions:
Apply spring through fall when pests are active.
Shake well before use. Apply early morning or late evening to minimize the potential for leaf burn.
Apply For active infestations: Spray directly on plants, ensuring complete coverage of all plant surfaces, including the undersides of leaves. For preventive use: Regularly spray leaves to prevent pests and diseases.
For active infestations: Spray directly on plants, ensuring complete coverage of all plant surfaces, including the undersides of leaves.
For preventive use: Regularly spray leaves to prevent pests and diseases.
sections.faq:
Tips from Yard Advisors:
What plants can I use Monterey® Garden Neem Oil on?
You can use it on all roses, flowers, houseplants, ornamental trees and shrubs, fruits, nuts, and vegetables grown in and around the home and garden.
What pests does Monterey® Garden Neem Oil control?
It controls various insect pests including whiteflies, mealybugs, armyworms, hornworms, leafhoppers, bagworms, leafminers, psyllids, fruit flies, loopers, budworms, beetles (including Japanese beetles), aphids, scales, caterpillars, midges, and mites (including spider mites).
What fungi does Monterey® Garden Neem Oil prevent?
It prevents and controls various fungal diseases including black spot on roses, powdery mildew, downy mildew, anthracnose, rust leaf spot, botrytis, needle rust, scab, and flower, twig, and tip blight.
Any additional instructions for application?
Do not apply when bees or other pollinators are present.
Avoid spraying on wilted or stressed plants.
Test on a small area first if applying to plants with tender tissue.
Do not apply in temperatures over 85°F to prevent leaf burn.
Can I apply Monterey® Garden Neem Oil alongside other Sunday products?
Yes! Neem Oil pairs perfectly with other Sunday products. Apply after any liquid applications have dried. If the neem oil gets wet due to rain or watering, reapply once the area dries.
Any state restrictions?
Monterey® Garden Neem Oil is approved for use in all states.
